description: Access the Metropolitan Museum of Art's collection through natural language queries. Search for artworks, retrieve detailed information, and explore various departments effortlessly. Enhance your AI's capabilities with rich art resources and data.

tools.name: search-museum-objects
tools.description: Search for objects in the Metropolitan Museum of Art (Met Museum). title.description: This should be set to true if you want to search for objects by title
